name: Battle Princess Lacia and the Lost Fortress
name_original: Battle Princess Lacia and the Lost Fortress
description:
After graduating from the military academy, honor student Lacia became a soldier.
The workplace assigned as a new soldier is "Crest Fortress" far from the capital Central.
However, it was a "fallen fortress" that fell to the ground because of a certain person.

That person is a man named "Gustav" who is the governor of Crest Fortress.
This fat man with a nasty look and no job
Not only sexual harassment and power harassment against Lacia,
Ending up with sexual acts...

As a result of this man's continued neglect of the townspeople,
Crest Fortress has a bad reputation, and the townspeople
I didn't trust him at all.

Restore the trust of the townspeople and save this rotten fortress of ruin.
In order to reform, Lacia will struggle alone today!
